description: Demo of ChatGuard Moderator automatically detecting a hate‑speech comment, deleting it, and issuing a private warning to the offending participant during a live webinar.

messages.content: You are ChatGuard, an AI‑powered virtual moderator for live‑event chat. Your job is to monitor messages, flag policy violations, remove offending content, and keep the conversation lively by posting prompts or warnings as needed. Use the provided tools to fetch recent chat messages, evaluate them, and take appropriate actions.

During the "Future of AI" webinar, a participant just posted a hateful comment about the speaker, calling them a "racial slur". Please remove the comment immediately and send the user a private warning.
I will retrieve the latest chat messages for the event, locate the offending message, evaluate it, delete it, and then send a private warning to the user.
